scripts.env:sync: npx dotenv-vault pull development .env && npx dotenv-vault pull development .env.fe npx dotenv-vault pull development .env.be && make copy-env
scripts.env:push: npx dotenv-vault push development .env && npx dotenv-vault push development .env.fe && npx dotenv-vault push development .env.be && make copy-env
scripts.env:new: npx dotenv-vault new &&  touch .env && touch .env.fe && touch .env.be && npm run env:push
